description: In 2019, during school we had to do work placement learning for 1 week, I chose to do mine at P.S.I Audio during this time I learned lots about what's it's like to work in the production industry. I thoroughly enjoyed my time.
Foundation Christian College, I have worked as a volunteer since I was 12 years old and once I graduated I was employed as an AV technician to run events and install gear and maintain the theatre.

Cameo Rascale is an internationally acclaimed acrobatic, comedy juggling act. When they come to my local area I am sometimes hired as a lighting designer for them. I have programmed and operated several of their shows including a promotional video.
